Question: This person continued to rework the material that would be published as A Moveable Feast through the end of the 1950s.
Hints: Ernest Miller **** (July 21, 1899 – July 2, 1961) was an American author and journalist.
Added to this person's physical ailments was the additional problem that he had been a heavy drinker for most of his life.
Fiedler believes this person inverts the American literary theme of the evil "Dark Woman" versus the good "Light Woman".
